thread.title: Video: Relive the final drive as Mangum returns to lead BYU to game-winning touchdown
thread.title_full: Video: Relive the final drive as Mangum returns to lead BYU to game-winning touchdown | Deseret News

author: Brandon Judd
title: Video: Relive the final drive as Mangum returns to lead BYU to game-winning touchdown
text:
Tanner Mangum went down with a hamstring injury late in the third quarter, but he returned to the field for BYU's final drive with the score tied at 38-38. Watch Mangum and Algernon Brown guide the Cougars downfield for the game-winning score.
Scoreboard BYU EAST CAROLINA 0 0 Full box score/Player stats Upcoming Games BYU Football BYU   Cincinnati @ BYU Lavell Edwards Stadium, Provo Oct. 16, 6:00 p.m. 5  Days   2  Hrs   33  Mins   54  Secs More Coverage Mangum looks like Bosco to lead BYU past East Carolina PROVO â€” When Tanner Mangum exited BYU's game with East Carolina Saturday night with a hamstring injury, the Cougars led 38-21 late in the third quarter.
When he hobbled back onto the field with 4:01 remaining, the Pirates had rallied to tie the game at 38-38.
The true freshman quarterback, along with junior running back Algernon Brown, proved to be the hero again, leading BYU on a 10-play, 75-yard drive ending with Brown breaking through for a 9-yard touchdown run with 19 seconds remaining in a 45-38 BYU victory.
On that final drive, Mangum completed 3-of-4 passes for 27 yards, while Brown carried the ball five times for 36 yards.
Watch the final drive in the video above.
